channel.title: Poems
channel.description:
Life is nothing but a blur, every time I turn, something new to occur. A death, a wreck, so sad, so tragic, I feel as if the world is some kind of wretched magic. All of this happening so quickly, All i want to do is flee. Run, Skip, none of it matters, The world just keeps getting sadder. People getting mad, Others being sad. Its a confusing place, You can hardly recognize the same face. The alcohol, the cars, We should send it all to Mars. A wretched and deadly combination, Has complete world domination. Michelle, may you rest in peace, and all of this irresponsibility come to cease.
What do you think o.o

item.title: Poems
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:9, topic:365245”][quote]
Grieve With Me

Grieve with me
What has this terrible war cost?
Comfort is the key,
yet why do I feel so lost?

Grieve with me
The earth hears my sadness.
Why can’t you see
this is a war of madness?

Grieve with me
My own country doesn’t know my name.
I risked my life for free,
how can this life of mine ever be the same?

Grieve with me
I feel as one with the Lost Generation
falling to one knee.
Oh death, sweep me away from this creation!

Grieve with me,
My life has come to an end
Grieve with me,
Grief has made this the end

[hr]

A Shred of Victory

As I traipse the battlegrounds,
there are but many sounds
to be heard among the lines.
All is pointed by many signs.

I have but one shred of victory,
despite my own valedictory.
The battle has been fought and won,
yet this raging war is far from done.

This war will surely never end,
yet to the skies I do extend
my every hope and devotion.
Success is my single emotion.

The light dawns upon a new day,
life grows more difficult in this array
of growing toil and devastation.
Upon the hill is my salvation.

Success is finally at my feet.
This war and this fight I have beat.
I have overcome the adversity;
my emotions, at last, have diversity.

One must keep his head held high,
for victory draws nearly nigh.
The conflict has been overthrown,
a new one begun-- as will be shown.

[/quote][/quote]

those are both pretty deep subjects taharok, but they are good

Read full topic

item.description:

Grieve With Me

Grieve with me

Oh death, sweep me away from this creation!

Grieve with me,
My life has come to an end
Grieve with me,
Grief has made this the end

[hr]

A Shred of Victory

As I traipse the battlegrounds,

to be heard among the lines.
All is pointed by many signs.

I have but one shred of victory,

The battle has been fought and won,

This war will surely never end,

Upon the hill is my salvation.

Success is finally at my feet.
This war and this fight I have beat.
I have overcome the adversity;

One must keep his head held high,
for victory draws nearly nigh.
The conflict has been overthrown,
a new one begun-- as will be shown.

item.title: Poems
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

This is a poem i did today in creative writing.

I'm all alone with no one to love They are all gone and i sit here in the corner The corner of my loneliness and sorrow I'm in the room of my pain and suffering While all my demons harass me I look to the opposite corner from where i was sitting. . .nothing I look up and down, side to side. . .still nothing I slowly clasp my hands over my chest and forcefully start to tear And the place where my heart rests. . .nothing And so now i'm all alone not knowing how to love

I know it sucks, but please don’t flame

Read full topic

item.title: Poems
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Possibly the most chilling lyrics I’ve ever heard, in an awesome song.
(not written by me)

Humanity's a failed experiment walking the path to extinction spinning its wheels endlessly grease them with oil and uranium

Humanitiy’s a failed experiment
walking the path to extinction

The earth will shake and the waters will rise
the elements reclaim what was taken
what was taken

The skyline is set ablaze
with regret
ashes cover a falling
silhouette
The city will reap what it’s sewn
and ignite
watching as the city burns
(tonight)

Blindly consuming mass manufactured faith
mankind is a festering parasite

Blindly consuming mass manufactured faith
mankind is a festering parasite
relentlessly draining its host dry
nailing belief to a cross of genocide

The elements reclaim what was taken
what was taken

The skyline is set ablaze
with regret
ashes cover a falling
silhouette
The city will reap what its sewn
and ignite
watching as the city burns
Tonight

Only after the last tree’s cut
and the last river poisoned
only after the last fish is caught
will you find that money cannot be eaten

When everything becomes irrelevant
When the sky tears open
fire rains down, fire rains down
the 4th world comes to an end
push the button, light the match
feel the fault lines detach
crosshairs in the evening light
I sit and watch the city burn
Tonight

The city burns tonight

Read full topic

item.title: Poems
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:365245”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=461450.msg3375686#msg3375686 date=1287601849]
It kinda sounds like a 5th grader wrote it.

‘The alcohol, the cars,
We should send it all to Mars.
A wretched and deadly combination,
Has complete world domination.’
[/quote]
I know i originally said i quit, I really dont care if you flame me on that, the reason i wrote that was for my Aunt, who was killed in a drunk-driving accident. I wrote that inside of a 10 minute frame, since that’s all the spare time i had in class.

OP:

Free Web Hosting

Free Web Hosting - Your Website need to be migrated

Absolutely Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL, cPanel and no Ads!

I do not feel that is advertising, since it is just a site for me to put shit on, for my family to see.[/quote]
Oh I’m sorry about that. Also, I wasn’t trying to flame in any way. I was just stating my opinion. <3
